Class MeteringDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.service.meteringdb.MeteringDataService

  • public class MeteringDataService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MeteringDataService(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createMeteringData()
      Creates metering data for all smart meters at a fixed rate concurrently The data generation for each smart meter is retried up to MAX_RETRIES times with a fixed interval between each attempt.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> findAllSmartMeterIds()
      Retrieves a list of all smart meter IDs from the that exist in the database This method is cached using the SmartMeterDCUCache cache manager.
      MeteringData insertMeteringData(SmartMeter smartMeter)
      Insert Metering Data in Database This method map the simulated data into MeteringData and then store the data
      java.util.List<MeteringData> returnMeteringData(java.util.List<java.lang.String> smartMeterIds) 
      MeteringData simulateMeteringData(java.lang.String smartMeterId)
      Simulate metering data for a given smart meter ID.
      void updateMeteringData(java.util.List<MeteringData> retrievedMeteringData)
      Mark the records that pushed to KillBill

        public MeteringData simulateMeteringData(java.lang.String smartMeterId)
        Simulate metering data for a given smart meter ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • findAllSmartMeterIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> findAllSmartMeterIds()
        Retrieves a list of all smart meter IDs from the that exist in the database This method is cached using the SmartMeterDCUCache cache manager.
        Returns:
        A list of all smart meter IDs.

      • createMeteringData

        public void createMeteringData()
        Creates metering data for all smart meters at a fixed rate concurrently The data generation for each smart meter is retried up to MAX_RETRIES times with a fixed interval between each attempt. The method is periodically executed

      • returnMeteringData

        public java.util.List<MeteringData> returnMeteringData(java.util.List<java.lang.String> smartMeterIds)

      • insertMeteringData

        public MeteringData insertMeteringData(SmartMeter smartMeter)
        Insert Metering Data in Database This method map the simulated data into MeteringData and then store the data
        Parameters:
        smartMeter - the simulated metering data of a smart meter
        Returns:
        MeteringData

        Parameters:
